title: British firms ‘falling behind global rivals’ in adopting AI
description: Matt Clifford, who wrote the UK’s artificial intelligence action plan, warns of a dangerous complacency
content:
A government review of technology adoption published this year found that AI could add £47 billion a year to the UK economy for the next decade, boosting productivity by 1.5 per cent a year, if the country adopted it fully and safely.
However, only 8... [1380 chars]

title: Is artificial intelligence overhyped or is AI the 'fourth industrial revolution'?
description: It's estimated 30,000 people are working in the AI industry in Australia, and fanfare is growing with start-ups tapping into billions of dollars of venture capital. Yet there are concerns about hype and a lack of regulation.
content:
Artificial intelligence has prompted a supercharged tech boom, with valuations of the world's biggest companies soaring on the Nasdaq amid talk about a new era of human-like algorithms.
Here in Australia, a microcosm of Silicon Valley is happening, w... [7542 chars]

title: The first AI government minister
description: When Albanian Prime Minister Edi Rama this month announced his new Cabinet, it was not his choice of finance minister or foreign minister that gained the most attention. The biggest news was Rama’s appointment of an artificial intelligence-powered bot as the new minister of public procurement. “Diella” will oversee and allocate all public tenders that the government assigns to

title: Auto firms tap digital universe, coaching staff to steer leads to showrooms
description: OEMs, too, are investing in dealer training and working to filter digital leads, besides using artificial intelligence (AI) tools to ensure better conversions
content: Sameer wants to buy a small sport utility vehicle (SUV); so on a Saturday afternoon, he browses social media and automobile websites. Several reels, popups, and links lure him to websites of original equipment manufacturers (OEMs). He clicks on one a... [296 chars]

title: The Hottest Thing in the Stock Market Is Suddenly Boring Tech
description: After years of soaring on hopes for a high-tech artificial-intelligence future, the stock market’s latest hot corner is an old fashioned part of the technology industry.
content:
After years of soaring on hopes for a high-tech artificial-intelligence future, the stock market’s latest hot corner is an old fashioned part of the technology industry.

title: Programmed to sooth and comfort, AI robot brings a different level of care in hospitals
description: Robin is an artificial intelligence-powered therapeutic robot programed that provides emotional support at nursing homes and hospital pediatric units.
content:
Days after Meagan Brazil-Sheehan’s 6-year-old son was diagnosed with leukemia, they were walking down the halls of UMass Memorial Children’s Medical Center when they ran into Robin the Robot.
“Luca, how are you?” it asked in a high-pitched voice prog... [5935 chars]

title: KGMU uses AI-based MRI scans for early detection of Alzheimer’s
description: Lucknow: Researchers at KGMU have started using advanced MRI scans with the help of artificial intelligence (AI) to detect Alzheimer's disease at a ve.
content: Lucknow: Researchers at KGMU have started using advanced MRI scans with the help of artificial intelligence (AI) to detect Alzheimer's disease at a very early stage—much before memory loss and confusion become visible. The aim is to give patients and... [2235 chars]

title: CEO Belief in AI Is Causing Indifference to Trump Policies
description: The promise of artificial intelligence is leading too many business leaders to downplay the dangers of current economic policy.
content: The president of the United States is currently engaged in efforts to compromise the independence of the Federal Reserve while simultaneously eroding the integrity of national economic data, abuse the powers of the FCC to censor broadcast programming... [480 chars]

title: AI Boom, Upcoming IPOs To Drive Indian Investors Toward US Markets: Finance Analysts
description: As Artificial Intelligence (AI) continues to reshape global markets and more high-value AI firms gear up for IPOs, Indian investors -- particularly the mass affluent -- are increasingly eyeing the US for the next wave of generational wealth creation, according to the Co-founders of Neev Finance.
